about_the_game:
This is the prologue of DragonLoop.
The prologue version is the first hour of the official edition.
DragonLoop is a 5-day timeloop metroidvania, with the prologue being a specially customized 3-day timeloop of 1 hour content. Players will be able to play some of the areas in this episode over a 3-day timeloop.
Please wishlist the DragonLoop if you like this game.



The heroine who lost her memory was trapped in a five-day loop.
Together with your partner, travel through a world with strange time changes, escape from reincarnation through exploration and combat, and learn the truth about the world!
In the cycle, you will regain your memory and continue to become stronger.
You can take advantage of new abilities, explore new areas, and defeat new enemies.
You can also go back to the old area, defeat enemies that are different from what you remember, and try to change your known destiny.
The game is a time loop Metroidvania.





Change of time
Dynamic world! Enemies, maps, NPCs... many contents will change over time. The game has a special timing method that allows you to explore as much as you want.

Fight happily
Easy-to-learn, fast-paced and smooth combat! Use the flexible [Link] to dash forward quickly, combine combos, and summon practical plants to assist in combat.

Boss battle
Use your powerful performance to engage in high-speed duels with dangerous bosses with different styles!

name: DragonLoop: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p 16:9 resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The heroine who lost her memory was trapped in a five-day loop. Connect with your partners to travel through a world with strange time changes, continue to become stronger, retrieve memories, and understand the truth. The game is a time loop Metroidvania.
